title: Ricky Carmichael Motocross Riding Tips #1 Starts
description:
For the first time ever, Ricky Carmichael shares some of the riding secrets that enabled him to become the Greatest Of All Time! In this first video on Starts, RC shows you how to dial in your technique and get the most out of your starts.
As a part of the Ricky Carmichael University curriculum, look for a new Riding Tip video each month.
